task: Create responsive, accessible HTML content webpage with interactive UI

workflow.step_1: Analyze content tone and subject matter
workflow.step_2: Select theme (colors, fonts, tone) matching content
workflow.step_3: Generate HTML that prefers shared external CSS/JS when working inside this repo (especially under iecc/), otherwise use lightweight inline styles/scripts
workflow.output: Single HTML file with interactive features; use shared external assets when available

project_conventions.repo_context: This repo hosts GitHub Pages content. Prefer maintainable, reusable assets over large inline blocks when building multiple pages with similar UI patterns.

iecc_sermon_pages.applies_to: Pages under iecc/ that follow the sermon UI (hero + sticky tabs + section content + tags).

inline_policy.css: Only allow small page-specific overrides inline (aim < 50 lines). If larger, create/update a theme CSS file under iecc/css/.
inline_policy.js: Avoid large inline <script> blocks. Put shared behaviors in iecc/js/iecc-common.js; only allow minimal per-page bootstrapping inline (e.g., one init call).

initialization.preferred: Use a data attribute on the page root to auto-initialize (e.g., data-sermon-date="YYYY-MM-DD").
initialization.acceptable: If the page uses a manual init pattern, include a tiny inline script that calls the shared initializer.

archetypes.name: Swiss Minimalist
archetypes.traits: Large typography, grid-based, high contrast, minimal shadows, sans-serif

archetypes.name: Modern Organic
archetypes.traits: Soft border-radius, pastel palette, serif headings, paper textures, floating cards

archetypes.name: Digital Brutalist
archetypes.traits: Monospace fonts, neon accents, thick borders, sharp edges, high saturation

archetypes.name: Classic Editorial
archetypes.traits: Traditional serif, refined palette, centered layouts, divider ornaments

archetypes.name: Contextual Wildcard
archetypes.traits: Invent a unique style specifically matching the content's metaphor, tone, or theme.

quotes.authors: Include all, cite sources accurately, mark paraphrases clearly

content_rules.structure: Chronological flow unless clarity requires restructuring

ui_components.selection_logic: Select 3-5 components that best fit the specific content density and structure. Do not use all.
ui_components.tooltip_spec: Float independently at top-right (all devices) for term definitions
ui_components.tabs_requirement: Sticky on top with hash-based routing (URL updates on tab change, supports back/forward navigation)
ui_components.default_state: Main content expanded, others collapsed unless beneficial

header.instruction: Please select options for each attribute below that best fit the content.
layout_options: **Experimental**: Create a layout that visually mimics the content theme or title.

type: **Generative CSS**: Use CSS patterns or SVG filters to create a dynamic background representing the content theme.
animation: **Custom Keyframes**: Create a subtle animation specific to the mood.

content.full: Generated by LLM with supervision by benjaminficusmicrocarpa. MIT License

color_strategy_options: **Thematic Extraction**: Extract the two dominant colors mentioned or visualized in the content and build a custom palette.

pairing_options: **Mood Match**: Select a font pairing that contradicts the others if it fits the content tone.

styling.accessibility: WCAG AA compliant (keyboard nav, ARIA, focus management)

technical.format: HTML + (Tailwind CSS optional) + vanilla JS; in-repo pages should reuse shared external CSS/JS when present
technical.optimization: Fast load, minimal dependencies, lazy-load images, print-friendly; avoid duplicating large CSS/JS across many pages
technical.routing: Use data-tab attributes and window.location.hash for tab navigation with hashchange listener
